title: NHM Chandigarh Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for 16 Lab Technician Posts
description: National Health Mission Chandigarh (NHM Chandigarh) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 16 Lab Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 12th, Diploma, and B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NHM Chandigarh Recruitment 2026 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of applicat...
